kyc.title: KYC policy
kyc.description: No KYC for basic plans. KYC upon request for custom configurations and sensitive GEOs.

payments.title: Payment methods

topProducts.title: Top products by SoksLine
topProducts.description: Three core proxy stacks for marketing, research, and automation teams.

staticIsp.label: Static Residential (ISP)

staticIsp.note: Best for ad platforms, marketplace management, and e-commerce QA.

staticIpv6.label: Static Residential (ISP) IPv6

rotating.label: Rotating Residential

hero.title: Static Residential (ISP) proxies
hero.description: Deploy genuine ISP-routed IPv4 with sticky sessions and unlimited bandwidth for account teams.

isp.sectionsTitle: What you can do with Static ISP proxies

sections.title: Control your proxy roster
sections.body: Assign dedicated IPs per operator, rotate on demand, and export usage by project.

sections.title: Geo precision
sections.body: Target by country, state, city, or ASN for high-match ad verifications.

sections.title: Enterprise ready
sections.body: SLA-backed uptime with 24/7 support and secure dashboards for distributed teams.

hero.title: Static Residential IPv6 pools

staticResidential.sectionsTitle: How IPv6 static pools accelerate your workflows

sections.title: Designed for scale
sections.body: Mass-provision addresses for registration and automation workloads at predictable rates.

sections.title: Flexible auth
sections.body: Username/password or IP whitelisting with configurable session length.

sections.title: Monitoring included
sections.body: Dashboards surface latency, success rate, and quick swaps for low-performing exits.

hero.title: Rotating residential proxies
hero.description: Meter traffic per GB with automatic rotation windows and sticky sessions when needed.

rotating.sectionsTitle: Why rotating residential works for automation

sections.title: Traffic-first billing
sections.body: Only pay for the bandwidth you consume with alerts for 70% and 90% thresholds.

sections.title: Automation
sections.body: Granular API gives you session tokens, whitelist control, and webhook events.

sections.title: Global coverage
sections.body: Fine-tune rotation by continent, country, or city without juggling multiple providers.

pricingOverview.title: SoksLine pricing
pricingOverview.subtitle: Explore per-proxy and per-GB plans for static ISP, static IPv6, and rotating residential proxies.

list.title: Why residential proxies matter
list.intro: Residential IPs mimic real user behavior, making them essential for sensitive automation.

sections.title: Avoid common blocks
sections.body: Residential IPs come from consumer devices, so fraud systems treat them as legitimate traffic.

sections.title: Maintain uptime
sections.body: Our monitoring rotates IPs automatically when destinations start failing.

sections.title: Measure performance
sections.body: Dashboards surface latency, success rates, and proxy health per target project.

list.title: Can I select a proxy location?
list.intro: Yes. Pick a country, state, city, or ASN across all proxy types.

sections.title: City precision
sections.body: Choose from 180+ locations with on-demand provisioning.

sections.title: Advanced targeting
sections.body: Filter by ASN or ISP to align with advertising needs.

sections.title: Self-service controls
sections.body: Update targeting in the dashboard or via API without downtime.

list.title: What targeting options are available?
list.intro: Fine-tune targeting for every plan: geo, ISP, ASN, rotation, and more.

sections.title: Geo filters
sections.body: Country, state, city, and custom radius targeting.

sections.title: Network attributes
sections.body: Filter by ASN, ISP, proxy type, or connection speed.

sections.title: Session controls
sections.body: Sticky sessions, concurrent limits, and rotation timers per profile.

list.title: How long does provisioning take?
list.intro: Provisioning is instant after payment confirmation.

sections.title: Automated delivery
sections.body: Most orders arrive within 2 minutes, with webhook confirmation.

sections.title: Manual review
sections.body: Custom GEO or sensitive use cases may trigger an agent review (under 12h).

sections.title: Onboarding support
sections.body: Documentation and chat support guide integration into your stack.

list.title: What is a rotating proxy?
list.intro: Rotating proxies change IPs automatically to spread requests across a large pool.

sections.title: Rotation windows
sections.body: Choose between automatic rotation or sticky sessions up to one hour.

sections.title: Usage-based billing
sections.body: Pay for the traffic you consume rather than the number of endpoints.

sections.title: Best for data teams
sections.body: Scraping, verification, and QA pipelines depend on continuous fresh IPs.

login.title: Log in
login.intro: Access the SoksLine dashboard to manage proxies, billing, and support tickets.
login.note: Need an account? Contact sales to get started.

aml.title: AML Policy
aml.intro: This Anti-Money Laundering (AML) Policy outlines how SoksLine prevents illicit activity while keeping onboarding simple for legitimate users.

sections.title: Screening
sections.body: We screen transactions that exceed automated thresholds or involve sensitive GEOs. Accounts may be paused while we verify ownership.

sections.title: KYC on request
sections.body: For custom plans we may request government-issued documents and proof of business operations. Basic plans do not require KYC.

sections.title: Reporting
sections.body: Suspicious activity is logged and reported to relevant financial authorities when required by law.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We process the minimum personal data needed to provide proxy services and billing.

sections.title: Data collected
sections.body: Account email, billing details, and usage telemetry are stored securely and encrypted at rest.

sections.title: How we use data
sections.body: Telemetry helps us monitor abuse, optimize routing, and notify you about outages or limits.

sections.title: Your control
sections.body: Contact privacy@soksline.com to request deletion, export, or updates to your personal data.

tos.title: Terms of Service
tos.intro: These Terms govern the use of SoksLine services.

sections.title: Service scope
sections.body: We provide proxy infrastructure and support as described on the website.

sections.title: Accounts
sections.body: Keep login credentials secure. Misuse or sharing with unauthorized parties may result in suspension.

sections.title: Liability
sections.body: SoksLine is not liable for indirect or consequential damages caused by service interruptions.

aup.title: Acceptable Use Policy
aup.intro: Respect local laws and platform rules when using SoksLine proxies.

sections.title: Prohibited activity
sections.body: No spam, fraud, credential stuffing, or content that violates intellectual property.

sections.title: Security
sections.body: Notify us immediately if you detect abuse or credential leaks involving your account.

sections.title: Enforcement
sections.body: We may suspend accounts that violate these rules without refund.

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.intro: We strive for transparency. Refunds are available when services do not match the described quality.

sections.title: Eligibility
sections.body: Refunds apply when uptime or IP quality falls below the documented SLA.

sections.title: Process
sections.body: Submit a ticket within 7 days of the issue with logs or screenshots.

sections.title: Exclusions
sections.body: Usage that violates the Acceptable Use Policy or exceeds purchased bandwidth is not eligible.
